TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnmanagedMemoryAccessor extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供从托管代码随机访问非托管内存块的能力。

span.span: Provides random access to unmanaged blocks of memory from managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的对象返回的内存使用的内存映射文件视图的非托管的块。The method of a object returns the unmanaged blocks of memory for working with views of memory-mapped files. [!INCLUDE[note_unnecessary_dispose](~/includes/note-unnecessary-dispose.md)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法编写不由其他轻松做到的中到大型规模结构中此类的方法。Use this method to write medium to large structures that are not easily accommodated by the other methods in this class.

span.span: is less than zero or greater than the capacity of the accessor.
The accessor does not support writing.
The accessor has been disposed.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
